Other Information.Additional Info: Paramagnetic oxygen is attracted to the magnetic channels
Diamagnetic nitrogen is rejected by the magnetic channels

Sieving Mechanism: Magnetic coupling with ZIF-8 sieving ability forms a magnetic sieving channel

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas permeability measurements using constant-volume/variable-pressure method
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: O2 permeability: 194 Barrer, O2/N2 selectivity: 11.79 (for 15 wt% Fe3O4@ZIF-8-8/Pebax MMMs)

Other Information.Additional Info: The magnetic field enhances O2 permeability and O2/N2 selectivity; Structurally ordered channels formed under magnetic field contribute to separation performance
